M.A. Viergever
B. van Ginneken
dcterms:description: The DRIVE dataset contains 40 retinal images, including 7 abnormal pathology cases, used for vessel segmentation. The version utilized includes data augmentation techniques such as random rotation, Gaussian noise, color jittering, and flips, increasing the number of training images from 20 to 256.
dcterms:title: DRIVE
